alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 3:18AM CST until January 04 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Locally higher amounts possible in southern Aitkin and southern Carlton counties. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Crow Wing, South Aitkin and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake area and the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; South Aitkin
